TextFieldSlot.name: TextFieldSlot
TextFieldSlot.docstring: Contains icons or buttons associated with an Input.

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.docstring: Override theme color for text field slot

TextFieldRoot.name: TextFieldRoot
TextFieldRoot.docstring: Captures user input with an optional slot for buttons and icons.

properties.name: auto_complete
properties.docstring: Whether the input should have autocomplete enabled

properties.name: default_value
properties.docstring: The value of the input when initially rendered.

properties.name: max_length
properties.docstring: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the input

properties.name: min_length
properties.docstring: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in the input

properties.name: name
properties.docstring: Name of the input, used when sending form data

properties.name: read_only
properties.docstring: Indicates whether the input is read-only

properties.name: required
properties.docstring: Indicates that the input is required

properties.name: list
properties.docstring: References a datalist for suggested options

events.name: on_change
events.docstring: Fired when the value of the textarea changes.

events.name: on_focus
events.docstring: Fired when the textarea is focused.

events.name: on_blur
events.docstring: Fired when the textarea is blurred.

events.name: on_key_down
events.docstring: Fired when a key is pressed down.

events.name: on_key_up
events.docstring: Fired when a key is released.

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.docstring: Override theme color for text field

styling_props.name: radius
styling_props.docstring: Override theme radius for text field: "none" | "small" | "medium" | "large" | "full"
